column4: mikeo, would like to switch to dvorak myself, but too difficult to me...
Sumguy, no love for Zune, either!  :)
Im just happy with a wireless card that works...though its brainless now...broadcom kicked my butt for so long...now its like a 2 minute process...but it sucked when iwas first getting into it
ndiswrapper is a rite of passage into ubuntu laptop heaven
